endpoints.description: Retrieve the current operational status of all mining machinery.
Submit and update the maintenance schedule for specific equipment.
Fetch detailed reports on the types and quantities of resources available across mining sites.
Initialize the detailed performance analysis for selected mining equipment.
Retrieve real-time metrics, such as resource extraction rates, for a specific piece of equipment.
Update operational settings for a specified piece of machinery.
Retrieve active alerts and warnings for mining machinery and operations.
Add a new mining site to the monitoring system.
Remove a piece of machinery from the data monitoring system by ID.
Fetch and download historical data logs for equipment and site production metrics.
